text:
Hi all,
For the last few days I've been experiencing this unpleasant situation that no longer allows me to work locally:
I try to upload a file or a folder, the response message says "OK" but actually it hasn't uploaded anything in design manager.
I tried, several times, both with hs upload .... and with npx hs upload ...
In both cases it always gives me "OK" but in reality it doesn't copy anything.
Even with the command "watch" nothing to do
Any suggestion?
Thanks

it sounds like it’s uploading, but not to the location you think it is. I would double-check the paths you’re using and look in design manager to see whether it’s successfully loading to the wrong place.
